information: mvs Metallvertriebs- und Service GmbH is a medium-sized family business based in eastern Westphalia. We are a stockholding trader with a focus on non-ferrous semi-finished products, industrial plastics and special materials and have made it our business to combine traditional trade and modern service for the benefit of our customers. Thanks to a highly motivated team of innovative and experienced employees, we are now the contact for well-known companies from industry, trade and craft throughout Germany and Western Europe. mvs has set itself the task of serving all customer requirements optimally and professionally. As a result, our customers receive exactly what they need – whether it's 10 kilograms or 10 tons of semi-finished products. We are looking forward to working with you to implement solutions to your procurement problems.
